changelog.1.0.1: Fixed Return not being accepted in text fields.
changelog.1.0.2: Fixed Icons disappearing upon loading. Fixed issues with setting cost values
changelog.1.0.3: Changed the spell list to include more spells from various sources. Added ritual tags to spells.
changelog.1.0.4: Inventory reworks. Added russian translation. R20 integration has the option to do a multiroll.
changelog.1.0.5: Fixed some translation issues. Double click now opens selected item/spell. Added russian translation for spells. Fixed a minor issue in the general tab. Added portraits.
changelog.1.1.0: Added scrollbars for all tabs. Added first scripts draft, for now without documentation, added automatic version check
changelog.1.1.1: Added proper script functionality. Added extra packet types for R20 integration.
changelog.1.1.3: App no longer asks to save a blank file. Removed legacy components.
changelog.1.1.4: Updated the target to .net 4.8. App now restarts on language changes. Made the UI more consistent. Removed a lot of unnecessary references. Added NLua to the list of 3rd party libraries.
changelog.1.1.5: Added a dark skin. Added a reverse UI generator for scripting.
changelog.1.1.6: Added a soft skin. Added the ability to use skins on systems other than win10/win8.1. Fixed a memory leak with icons. Fixed a crash with negative HP/XP/THP values. Added stat modifiers. Added the ability to recalculate your inventory's weight. Added a keybinding to delete selected inventory items.
changelog.1.1.7: Fixed item weights not displaying correctly. Scripts now have access to ObjectIDs to save data easier. Scripts now have a built-in json <-> table converter. Added the Scripts Marketplace (Experimental)
changelog.1.1.8: Fixed application crashing when deleting items with a hotkey. Fixed stat modifiers being reapplied each file reload. Added a button to reset all death roll results. Added a button to recalculate all stats.
changelog.1.1.9: Fixed the cleric spell filter not working in russian language. Fixed the certificate error on Win7. Added color option to spells and items. Fixed inventory weight sorting. Fixed spell components not appearing in the spell's short description. Fixed the version checker window issue.
changelog.1.2.0: Major application update. Added macros. Added feat cards. Added many new icons for items. Many things can now be copy-pasted. Items can be nested in other items. Added tooltips to many buttons. Added localization for window titles. Some fixes. There are more changes that likely didn't make it into this limited window.
changelog.1.2.1: Added an error message when defining a local with the same name/without specifying a value. Fixed some localization issues. Made localization more consistent. Changed some UI arrangement
changelog.1.2.2: Fixed an issue that prevented feats from being pasted. Fixed images not being loaded in time. Reworked the image loading code - now allows for images with the same name and loads on-demand. Fixed the stat modifiers(app) changing the stat modifier(dnd) values upon save loading. Removed item/spell templates from save/load data.
changelog.1.2.3: Updater should now work on Win7 or older. Updater is now updated by the main app. Code Refactoring. Removed the Xceed.Toolkit dependency due to licensing changes of the library. Allowed the app to handle the situations where the user selects an image for a spell/item/feat that is located outside of the app's directory. The application now generates a log upon an unexpected crash, and asks the user to revert their settings upon next startup.
changelog.1.2.4: Changed the item layout (again). Item amounts can now be changed without opening the item edit window. Items can now be set to not contribute to total inventory weight. Fixed an issue where numeric up downs would not let you change the value with the buttons. Improved macro load performance. Fixed script custom window crashing the app. Fixed Containers duplicating container text each save.
changelog.1.2.5: Fixed the input in fields with decimal points. Fixed items being removed from their containers upon being edited. Fixed copying items also copying their container reference. Fixed double click being handled regardless of them being handled by other elements. Fixed window minimizing issues. Fixed spell descriptions not conforming to the active skin. Fixed the app asking you to save changes every single time regardless if there were actually changes made.
changelog.1.2.6: Skins should now natively work on win7/8/8.1. Updated dependencies. Fixed text padding issues on aero2(win7/vista). Fixed duplicate entries for macros after a "fake" app reload, such as ones caused by changing language/skin. Fixed the absolute void that was the class bar on win7/8/8.1. Fixed font sizes for aero2(win7/vista). As skins now work properly on win7, removed the experimental option. Fixed positioning of macro output icon.
changelog.1.3.0: Fixed an issue where macros would not translate correctly leading to issues on other languages due to a race condition. Added a translation for the 'all' category for macros. Crash reports should no longer say that the os is 'Platform'. Fixed a crash when opening a save file where any item would have its icon path as an empty string but not a null value.  Added the ability to do rolls/messages/macros that will show up for GM only. Allowed negative numbers in all change value dialogs. Added quick roll20 integration for items. Added the ability for the app to auto-update and a setting to not show the update notifications. Added simple roll20 integration for spells. Spells can now be copied and pasted.
changelog.1.3.1: Updated dependencies. Added missing translation keys for spell integrations. Added negative input values for up/down controls for some parameters. Fixed an issue with the cut button executing the paste command. Updated the about window to include the latest credits. Updated the spell database to include TCoE spells and many others. Added Artificer support. Portraits are now saved internally within the save itself and can be shared.
